OM : milieu ou d√©fenseur ? Kamara a une pr√©f√©rence !
Align√© dans l'entre-jeu face √† Lille, le jeune joueur de Marseille Boubacar Kamara a affich√© sa pr√©f√©rence.
03 Nov 2019, 08:00 by Hugo Deloraine



Jonathan Ikon√©Buteur lors de sa premi√®re s√©lection, hier soir face √† l'Albanie. Mais ils sont plusieurs dans son cas ! Voici quelques joueurs qui, tout comme le jeune lillois, ont marqu√© lors de leur premi√®re s√©lection en √âquipe de France A.Icon Sport



Just FontaineIl marque un tripl√© contre le Luxembourg le 17 d√©cembre 1953, tr√®s belle mani√®re d'honorer sa toute premi√®re s√©lection en Bleus !Icon Sport



Michel PlatiniNous somme le 27 mars 1976, Michel Platini marque son premier but avec les Bleus lors de sa premi√®re s√©lection. Face √† la Tch√©coslovaquie, il inscrit ce but sur coup-franc ! Chapeau l'artiste.Icon Sport



Daniel Bravo√Ä seulement 19 ans, l'ancien joueur du PSG honore sa premi√®re s√©lection face √† l'Italie, le 23 f√©vrier 1982. Il marquera d√®s ses d√©buts, il sera ensuite surnomm√© ¬´ Petit prince ¬ª.Icon Sport



Zin√©dine ZidaneLe 17 ao√ªt 1994, il entre en jeu pour la premi√®re fois sous le maillot Bleus. La France est men√©e 2-0 par la R√©publique Tch√®que, mais Zizou marquera deux buts en deux minites pour permettre aux siens d'arracher le match nul !Icon Sport



Karim BenzemaFace √† l'Autriche le 28 mars 2007, l'attaquant de l'OL, √† l'√©poque, marque face √† l'Autriche en Amical et f√™te dignement sa premi√®re s√©lection !Icon Sport



Baf√©timbi GomisLe 27 mai 2008, l'attaquant entre en jeu √† la mi-temps du match de pr√©paration √† l'Euro 2008 face √† l'√©quateur. Il marquera un doubl√© en seconde mi-temps ! Le dernier √† l'avoir fait √©tait un certain Zin√©dine Zidane !Icon Sport



Mathieu ValbuenaEn 2010, lors d'un match de pr√©paration pour la Coupe du Monde face au Costa Rica, ¬´ Petit V√©lo ¬ª marque vingt minutes apr√®s son entr√©e en jeu !Icon Sport



Marvin MartinNous sommes le 6 juin 2011. Marvin Martin entre en jeu √† 15 minutes de la fin de la rencontre et marque un doubl√© lors de la victoire 4-1 face √† l'Ukraine.Icon Sport

√âquipe de France : comme Ikon√©, ils ont marqu√© pour leur premi√®re s√©lection




Habituel d√©fenseur central, Boubacar Kamara a jou√© au poste de sentinelle, devant la d√©fense lors de la victoire de l'OM face au Losc (2-1). √Ä ce poste, il¬† a r√©ussi un excellent match ce qui lui a permis de gratter plusieurs ballons. Interrog√© en zone mixte par de nombreux journalistes, il a r√©pondu aux questions concernant son poste inhabituel.




"Je pr√©f√®re √™tre en d√©fense centrale"




OM+9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Surpris, le jeune marseillais ne l'a pas √©t√© :"La veille, le coach m'en avait un peu parl√©. Mais je l'ai appris ce matin (samedi) √† la causerie. J'essaye de donner le meilleur de moi-m√™me, de courir pour l'√©quipe, d'√™tre pr√©sent sur les deuxi√®mes ballons, de couper les relations qu'ils avaient entre milieux et attaquants." A-t-il une pr√©f√©rence ? Il r√©pond :"Je pr√©f√®re √™tre en d√©fense centrale, mon poste de formation.Mais s'il faut me mettre √† ce poste-l√† pour aider l'√©quipe, je le ferai." Occupera-t-il a nouveau ce poste ? R√©ponse la semaine prochaine, dans l'Olympico.

League 1
OM: middle or defender? Kamara has a preference!
Aligned in midfield against Lille, the young player Marseille Boubacar Kamara posted his preference.
03 Nov 2019, 08:00 by Hugo Deloraine



Jonathan Ikon√©Buteur during his first selection last night against Albania. But there are many in his case! Here are some players who, as the young Lille, scored during their first selection in Team France A.Icon Sport



Just FontaineIt scored a hat-trick against Luxembourg on 17 December 1953, a great way to honor his very first selection in Blue! Icon Sport



Michel PlatiniWe are on March 27, 1976, Michel Platini scores his first goal with the Blues during his first selection. Against Czechoslovakia, he scored this goal on free-kick! Hat the artist.Icon Sport



Daniel BravoAt only 19 years old, the former PSG player honors his first selection against Italy, on February 23, 1982. He will mark from the beginning, he will then be nicknamed "Little Prince" .Icon Sport



Zin√©dine Zidane On August 17, 1994, he entered the game for the first time under the shirt Blue. France are led 2-0 by the Czech Republic, but Zizou will score two goals in two minutes to allow his team to snatch the draw!



Karim BenzemaFace to Austria on March 28, 2007, the striker OL, at the time, scored against Austria in friendly and celebrates his first selection!



Baf√©timbi GomisOn 27 May 2008, the striker comes into play at the half-time of the preparation match for Euro 2008 against the equator. He will score twice in the second half! The last one to do it was Zin√©dine Zidane! Icon Sport



Mathieu ValbuenaIn 2010, during a preparation match for the World Cup against Costa Rica, "Little Bike" marks twenty minutes after its entry into play!



Marvin MartinWe are June 6, 2011. Marvin Martin comes into play 15 minutes from the end of the game and scores a double in the 4-1 win against Ukraine.Icon Sport

France team: like Ikon√©, they scored for their first selection




Habitual central defender Boubacar Kamara played as sentry in front of the defense in OM's win against Losc (2-1). In that role, he had a great game which allowed him to scratch several balls. Interviewed in a mixed zone by many journalists, he answered questions about his unusual post.




"I prefer to be in central defense"




OM + 9 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Surprised, the young Marseille was not: "The day before, the coach had told me a little, but I learned this morning (Saturday) at the chat I try to give the best of me even to run for the team, to be present on the second balloons, to cut the relations that they had between circles and attackers. " Does he have a preference? He answers: "I prefer to be in central defense, my training position. But if I have to put myself in that position to help the team, I will do it." Will he take over this job again? Answer next week, in Olympico.
